1.0.name: wordpress/google-url-builder
1.0.description:
Tracking your custom online marketing campaigns have never been easier.

How this plugin can help you?

  • Tag social media campaigns and links you share on social media sites;
  • Tag links in your e-mails;
  • Get detailed information how each tagged source of traffic is doing (check it via Google Analytics);
  • ...and more.

For more information visit: OnlineAds.lt.
